verses.verse: And Avraham <WH85> was old <WH2204> <WH8804>, and well stricken <WH935> <WH8804> in age <WH3117>: and the YY <WH3068> had blessed <WH1288> <WH8765> Avraham <WH85> in all things.

And Avraham <WH85> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his eldest <WH2205> servant <WH5650> of his house <WH1004>, that ruled over <WH4910> <WH8802> all that he had, Put <WH7760> <WH8798>, I pray thee, thy hand <WH3027> under my thigh <WH3409>:

And I will make thee swear <WH7650> <WH8686> by the YY <WH3068>, the 'Elohim <WH430> of heaven <WH8064>, and the 'Elohim <WH430> of the earth <WH776>, that thou shalt not take <WH3947> <WH8799> a wife <WH802> unto my son <WH1121> of the daughters <WH1323> of the Kanahanites <WH3669>, among <WH7130> whom I dwell <WH3427> <WH8802>:
But thou shalt go <WH3212> <WH8799> unto my country <WH776>, and to my kindred <WH4138>, and take <WH3947> <WH8804> a wife <WH802> unto my son <WH1121> Yitz'chak <WH3327>.

And the servant <WH5650> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Peradventure the woman <WH802> will not be willing <WH14> <WH8799> to follow <WH3212> <WH8800> me <WH310> unto this land <WH776>: must I needs bring <WH7725> <WH8687> thy son <WH1121> again <WH7725> <WH8686> unto the land <WH776> from whence thou camest <WH3318> <WH8804> ?
And Avraham <WH85> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Beware <WH8104> <WH8734> thou that thou bring <WH7725> not <WH6435> my son <WH1121> thither again <WH7725> <WH8686>.

The YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of heaven <WH8064>, which took me <WH3947> <WH8804> from my father's <WH1> house <WH1004>, and from the land <WH776> of my kindred <WH4138>, and which spake <WH1696> <WH8765> unto me, and that sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Unto thy seed <WH2233> will I give <WH5414> <WH8799> this land <WH776>; he shall send <WH7971> <WH8799> his angel <WH4397> before thee <WH6440>, and thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH8804> a wife <WH802> unto my son <WH1121> from thence.

And if the woman <WH802> will not be willing <WH14> <WH8799> to follow <WH3212> <WH8800> thee <WH310>, then thou shalt be clear <WH5352> <WH8738> from this my oath <WH7621>: only bring <WH7725> not my son <WH1121> thither again <WH7725> <WH8686>.

And the servant <WH5650> put <WH7760> <WH8799> his hand <WH3027> under the thigh <WH3409> of Avraham <WH85> his master <WH113>, and sware <WH7650> <WH8735> to him concerning <WH5921> that <WH2088> matter <WH1697>.

And the servant <WH5650> took <WH3947> <WH8799> ten <WH6235> camels <WH1581> of the camels <WH1581> of his master <WH113>, and departed <WH3212> <WH8799>; for all the goods <WH2898> of his master <WH113> were in his hand <WH3027>: and he arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and went <WH3212> <WH8799> to Mesopotamia <WH763>, unto the city <WH5892> of Nahor <WH5152>.

And he made <WH1288> his camels <WH1581> to kneel down <WH1288> <WH8686> without <WH2351> the city <WH5892> by <WH413> a well <WH875> of water <WH4325> at the time <WH6256> of the evening <WH6153>, even the time <WH6256> that women go out <WH3318> <WH8800> to draw <WH7579> <WH8802> water.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, O YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of my master <WH113> Avraham <WH85>, I pray thee, send me <WH6440> good speed <WH7136> <WH8685> this day <WH3117>, and shew <WH6213> <WH8798> kindness <WH2617> unto <WH5973> my master <WH113> Avraham <WH85>.

Behold, I stand <WH5324> <WH8737> here by the well <WH5869> of water <WH4325>; and the daughters <WH1323> of the men <WH582> of the city <WH5892> come out <WH3318> <WH8802> to draw <WH7579> <WH8800> water <WH4325>:

And let it come to pass, that the damsel <WH5291> to whom I shall say <WH559> <WH8799>, Let down <WH5186> <WH8685> thy pitcher <WH3537>, I pray thee, that I may drink <WH8354> <WH8799>; and she shall say <WH559> <WH8804>, Drink <WH8354> <WH8798>, and I will give <WH8248> thy camels <WH1581> drink <WH8248> <WH8686> also: let the same be she that thou hast appointed <WH3198> <WH8689> for thy servant <WH5650> Yitz'chak <WH3327>; and thereby shall I know <WH3045> <WH8799> that thou hast shewed <WH6213> <WH8804> kindness <WH2617> unto my master <WH113>.

And it came to pass, before he had done <WH3615> <WH8765> speaking <WH1696> <WH8763>, that, behold, Rebekah <WH7259> came out <WH3318> <WH8802>, who <WH834> was born <WH3205> <WH8795> to Bethuel <WH1328>, son <WH1121> of Milcah <WH4435>, the wife <WH802> of Nahor <WH5152>, Avraham's <WH85> brother <WH251>, with her pitcher <WH3537> upon her shoulder <WH7926>.

And the damsel <WH5291> was very <WH3966> fair <WH2896> to look upon <WH4758>, a virgin <WH1330>, neither had any man <WH376> known <WH3045> <WH8804> her: and she went down <WH3381> <WH8799> to the well <WH5869>, and filled <WH4390> <WH8762> her pitcher <WH3537>, and came up <WH5927> <WH8799>.

And the servant <WH5650> ran <WH7323> <WH8799> to meet her <WH7125> <WH8800>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let me, I pray thee, drink <WH1572> <WH8685> a little <WH4592> water <WH4325> of thy pitcher <WH3537>.

And she said <WH559> <WH8799>, Drink <WH8354> <WH8798>, my lord <WH113>: and she hasted <WH4116> <WH8762>, and let down <WH3381> <WH8686> her pitcher <WH3537> upon her hand <WH3027>, and gave him drink <WH8248> <WH8686>.

And when she had done <WH3615> <WH8762> giving him drink <WH8248> <WH8687>, she said <WH559> <WH8799>, I will draw <WH7579> <WH8799> water for thy camels <WH1581> also, until they have done <WH3615> <WH8765> drinking <WH8354> <WH8800>.

And she hasted <WH4116> <WH8762>, and emptied <WH6168> <WH8762> her pitcher <WH3537> into the trough <WH8268>, and ran <WH7323> <WH8799> again unto the well <WH875> to draw <WH7579> <WH8800> water, and drew <WH7579> <WH8799> for all his camels <WH1581>.

And the man <WH376> wondering <WH7583> <WH8693> at her held his peace <WH2790> <WH8688>, to wit <WH3045> <WH8800> whether the YY <WH3068> had made <WH6743> his journey <WH1870> prosperous <WH6743> <WH8689> or <WH518> not.

And it came to pass, as the camels <WH1581> had done <WH3615> <WH8765> drinking <WH8354> <WH8800>, that the man <WH376> took <WH3947> <WH8799> a golden <WH2091> earring <WH5141> of half a shekel <WH1235> weight <WH4948>, and two <WH8147> bracelets <WH6781> for her hands <WH3027> of ten <WH6235> shekels weight <WH4948> of gold <WH2091>;

And said <WH559> <WH8799>, Whose <WH4310> daughter <WH1323> art thou <WH859>? tell <WH5046> <WH8685> me, I pray thee: is there <WH3426> room <WH4725> in thy father's <WH1> house <WH1004> for us to lodge in <WH3885> <WH8800> ?
And she said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, I am the daughter <WH1323> of Bethuel <WH1328> the son <WH1121> of Milcah <WH4435>, which she bare <WH3205> <WH8804> unto Nahor <WH5152>.
She said <WH559> <WH8799> moreover unto him, We have both <WH1571> straw <WH8401> and provender <WH4554> enough <WH7227>, and <WH1571> room <WH4725> to lodge in <WH3885> <WH8800>.
And the man <WH376> bowed down his head <WH6915> <WH8799>, and worshipped <WH7812> <WH8691> the YY <WH3068>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of my master <WH113> Avraham <WH85>, who hath not left destitute <WH5800> <WH8804> <WH5973> my master <WH113> of his mercy <WH2617> and his truth <WH571>: I being in the way <WH1870>, the YY <WH3068> led me <WH5148> <WH8804> to the house <WH1004> of my master's <WH113> brethren <WH251>.
And the damsel <WH5291> ran <WH7323> <WH8799>, and told <WH5046> <WH8686> them of her mother's <WH517> house <WH1004> these things <WH1697>.
And Rebekah <WH7259> had a brother <WH251>, and his name <WH8034> was Laban <WH3837>: and Laban <WH3837> ran <WH7323> <WH8799> out <WH2351> unto the man <WH376>, unto the well <WH5869>.

And it came to pass, when he saw <WH7200> <WH8800> the earring <WH5141> and bracelets <WH6781> upon his sister's <WH269> hands <WH3027>, and when he heard <WH8085> <WH8800> the words <WH1697> of Rebekah <WH7259> his sister <WH269>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Thus <WH3541> spake <WH1696> <WH8765> the man <WH376> unto me; that he came <WH935> <WH8799> unto the man <WH376>; and, behold, he stood <WH5975> <WH8802> by <WH5921> the camels <WH1581> at the well <WH5869>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Come in <WH935> <WH8798>, thou blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> of the YY <WH3068>; wherefore standest <WH5975> <WH8799> thou without <WH2351>? for I have prepared <WH6437> <WH8765> the house <WH1004>, and room <WH4725> for the camels <WH1581>.

And the man <WH376> came <WH935> <WH8799> into the house <WH1004>: and he ungirded <WH6605> <WH8762> his camels <WH1581>, and gave <WH5414> <WH8799> straw <WH8401> and provender <WH4554> for the camels <WH1581>, and water <WH4325> to wash <WH7364> <WH8800> his feet <WH7272>, and the men's <WH582> feet <WH7272> that were with him.

And there was set <WH7760> <WH8714> <WH8675> <WH3455> <WH8799> meat before him <WH6440> to eat <WH398> <WH8800>: but he said <WH559> <WH8799>, I will not eat <WH398> <WH8799>, until I have told <WH1696> <WH8765> mine errand <WH1697>. And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Speak on <WH1696> <WH8761>.
And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, I am Avraham's <WH85> servant <WH5650>.

And the YY <WH3068> hath blessed <WH1288> <WH8765> my master <WH113> greatly <WH3966>; and he is become great <WH1431> <WH8799>: and he hath given <WH5414> <WH8799> him flocks <WH6629>, and herds <WH1241>, and silver <WH3701>, and gold <WH2091>, and menservants <WH5650>, and maidservants <WH8198>, and camels <WH1581>, and asses <WH2543>.

And Sarah <WH8283> my master's <WH113> wife <WH802> bare <WH3205> <WH8799> a son <WH1121> to my master <WH113> when <WH310> she was old <WH2209>: and unto him hath he given <WH5414> <WH8799> all that he hath.

And my master <WH113> made me swear <WH7650> <WH8686>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Thou shalt not take <WH3947> <WH8799> a wife <WH802> to my son <WH1121> of the daughters <WH1323> of the Kanahanites <WH3669>, in whose land <WH776> I dwell <WH3427> <WH8802>:
But <WH518> thou shalt go <WH3212> <WH8799> unto my father's <WH1> house <WH1004>, and to my kindred <WH4940>, and take <WH3947> <WH8804> a wife <WH802> unto my son <WH1121>.
And I said <WH559> <WH8799> unto my master <WH113>, Peradventure the woman <WH802> will not follow <WH3212> <WH8799> <WH310> me.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, The YY <WH3068>, before <WH6440> whom I walk <WH1980> <WH8694>, will send <WH7971> <WH8799> his angel <WH4397> with thee, and prosper <WH6743> <WH8689> thy way <WH1870>; and thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH8804> a wife <WH802> for my son <WH1121> of my kindred <WH4940>, and of my father's <WH1> house <WH1004>:

Then shalt thou be clear <WH5352> <WH8735> from this my oath <WH423>, when thou comest <WH935> <WH8799> to my kindred <WH4940>; and if they give <WH5414> <WH8799> not thee one, thou shalt be clear <WH5355> from my oath <WH423>.

And I came <WH935> <WH8799> this day <WH3117> unto the well <WH5869>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, O YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of my master <WH113> Avraham <WH85>, if now thou do <WH3426> prosper <WH6743> <WH8688> my way <WH1870> which I go <WH1980> <WH8802>:

Behold, I stand <WH5324> <WH8737> by the well <WH5869> of water <WH4325>; and it shall come to pass, that when the virgin <WH5959> cometh forth <WH3318> <WH8802> to draw <WH7579> <WH8800> water, and I say <WH559> <WH8804> to her, Give me <WH8248>, I pray thee, a little <WH4592> water <WH4325> of thy pitcher <WH3537> to drink <WH8248> <WH8685>;

And she say <WH559> <WH8804> to me, Both drink <WH8354> <WH8798> thou, and I will also draw <WH7579> <WH8799> for thy camels <WH1581>: let the same be the woman <WH802> whom the YY <WH3068> hath appointed out <WH3198> <WH8689> for my master's <WH113> son <WH1121>.

And before I had done <WH3615> <WH8762> speaking <WH1696> <WH8763> in mine heart <WH3820>, behold, Rebekah <WH7259> came forth <WH3318> <WH8802> with her pitcher <WH3537> on her shoulder <WH7926>; and she went down <WH3381> <WH8799> unto the well <WH5869>, and drew <WH7579> <WH8799> water: and I said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, Let me drink <WH8248> <WH8685>, I pray thee.

And she made haste <WH4116> <WH8762>, and let down <WH3381> <WH8686> her pitcher <WH3537> from her shoulder, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Drink <WH8354> <WH8798>, and I will give <WH8248> thy camels <WH1581> drink <WH8248> <WH8686> also: so I drank <WH8354> <WH8799>, and she made <WH8248> the camels <WH1581> drink <WH8248> <WH8689> also.

And I asked <WH7592> <WH8799> her, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Whose daughter <WH1323> art thou? And she said <WH559> <WH8799>, The daughter <WH1323> of Bethuel <WH1328>, Nahor's <WH5152> son <WH1121>, whom Milcah <WH4435> bare <WH3205> <WH8804> unto him: and I put <WH7760> <WH8799> the earring <WH5141> upon her face <WH639>, and the bracelets <WH6781> upon her hands <WH3027>.

And I bowed down my head <WH6915> <WH8799>, and worshipped <WH7812> <WH8691> the YY <WH3068>, and blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of my master <WH113> Avraham <WH85>, which had led me <WH5148> <WH8689> in the right <WH571> way <WH1870> to take <WH3947> <WH8800> my master's <WH113> brother's <WH251> daughter <WH1323> unto his son <WH1121>.

And now if ye will <WH3426> deal <WH6213> <WH8802> kindly <WH2617> and truly <WH571> with my master <WH113>, tell <WH5046> <WH8685> me: and if not, tell <WH5046> <WH8685> me; that I may turn <WH6437> <WH8799> to the right hand <WH3225>, or <WH176> to the left <WH8040>.

Then Laban <WH3837> and Bethuel <WH1328> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799>, The thing <WH1697> proceedeth <WH3318> <WH8804> from the YY <WH3068>: we cannot <WH3201> <WH8799> speak <WH1696> <WH8763> unto thee bad <WH7451> or <WH176> good <WH2896>.

Behold, Rebekah <WH7259> is before thee <WH6440>, take <WH3947> <WH8798> her, and go <WH3212> <WH8798>, and let her be thy master's <WH113> son's <WH1121> wife <WH802>, as the YY <WH3068> hath spoken <WH1696> <WH8765>.
And it came to pass, that, when Avraham's <WH85> servant <WH5650> heard <WH8085> <WH8804> their words <WH1697>, he worshipped <WH7812> <WH8691> the YY <WH3068>, bowing himself to the earth <WH776>.

And the servant <WH5650> brought forth <WH3318> <WH8686> jewels <WH3627> of silver <WH3701>, and jewels <WH3627> of gold <WH2091>, and raiment <WH899>, and gave <WH5414> <WH8799> them to Rebekah <WH7259>: he gave <WH5414> <WH8804> also to her brother <WH251> and to her mother <WH517> precious things <WH4030>.

And they did eat <WH398> <WH8799> and drink <WH8354> <WH8799>, he and the men <WH582> that were with him, and tarried all night <WH3885> <WH8799>; and they rose up <WH6965> <WH8799> in the morning <WH1242>, and he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Send me away <WH7971> <WH8761> unto my master <WH113>.

And her brother <WH251> and her mother <WH517> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let the damsel <WH5291> abide <WH3427> <WH8799> with us a few days <WH3117>, at the least <WH176> ten <WH6218>; after <WH310> that she shall go <WH3212> <WH8799>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Hinder me <WH309> <WH8762> not, seeing the YY <WH3068> hath prospered <WH6743> <WH8689> my way <WH1870>; send me away <WH7971> <WH8761> that I may go <WH3212> <WH8799> to my master <WH113>.
And they said <WH559> <WH8799>, We will call <WH7121> <WH8799> the damsel <WH5291>, and enquire <WH7592> <WH8799> at her mouth <WH6310>.

And they called <WH7121> <WH8799> Rebekah <WH7259>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, Wilt thou go <WH3212> <WH8799> with this man <WH376>? And she said <WH559> <WH8799>, I will go <WH3212> <WH8799>.
And they sent away <WH7971> <WH8762> Rebekah <WH7259> their sister <WH269>, and her nurse <WH3243> <WH8688>, and Avraham's <WH85> servant <WH5650>, and his men <WH582>.

And they blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> Rebekah <WH7259>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, Thou <WH859> art our sister <WH269>, be thou <WH1961> <WH8798> the mother of thousands <WH505> of millions <WH7233>, and let thy seed <WH2233> possess <WH3423> <WH8799> the gate <WH8179> of those which hate <WH8130> <WH8802> them.

And Rebekah <WH7259> arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and her damsels <WH5291>, and they rode <WH7392> <WH8799> upon the camels <WH1581>, and followed <WH3212> <WH8799> <WH310> the man <WH376>: and the servant <WH5650> took <WH3947> <WH8799> Rebekah <WH7259>, and went his way <WH3212> <WH8799>.
And Yitz'chak <WH3327> came <WH935> <WH8804> from the way <WH935> <WH8800> of the well Lahairoi <WH883>; for he dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> in the south <WH5045> country <WH776>.

And Yitz'chak <WH3327> went out <WH3318> <WH8799> to meditate <WH7742> <WH8800> in the field <WH7704> at <WH6437> <WH8800> the eventide <WH6153>: and he lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> his eyes <WH5869>, and saw <WH7200> <WH8799>, and, behold, the camels <WH1581> were coming <WH935> <WH8802>.
And Rebekah <WH7259> lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> her eyes <WH5869>, and when she saw <WH7200> <WH8799> Yitz'chak <WH3327>, she lighted <WH5307> <WH8799> off <WH5921> the camel <WH1581>.

For she had said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the servant <WH5650>, What <WH4310> man <WH376> is this <WH1976> that walketh <WH1980> <WH8802> in the field <WH7704> to meet us <WH7125> <WH8800>? And the servant <WH5650> had said <WH559> <WH8799>, It is my master <WH113>: therefore she took <WH3947> <WH8799> a vail <WH6809>, and covered herself <WH3680> <WH8691>.
And the servant <WH5650> told <WH5608> <WH8762> Yitz'chak <WH3327> all things <WH1697> that he had done <WH6213> <WH8804>.

And Yitz'chak <WH3327> brought her <WH935> <WH8686> into his mother <WH517> Sarah's <WH8283> tent <WH168>, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> Rebekah <WH7259>, and she became his wife <WH802>; and he loved <WH157> <WH8799> her: and Yitz'chak <WH3327> was comforted <WH5162> <WH8735> after <WH310> his mother's <WH517> death.
